# subtitle

**Instance Property**

A string to display as the subtitle in the navigation bar.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var subtitle: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If `attributedSubtitle` is `non-nil`, this property just returns the `String` representation of the `attributedString`. If `subtitleView` is non-nil, this property is ignored.

## Configuring the subtitle

- **attributedSubtitle**
- **largeSubtitle**: String to be rendered below the large title.
- **largeAttributedSubtitle**

items.description: String to be rendered below the large title.
items.name: largeSubtitle

title: subtitle
